pr_title: Migrates to using a context when span is started

timeline.message:
Return Context when starting span to preserve baggage.

Co-authored-by: Marcin Grzejszczak <marcin.grzejszczak@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: I think we can optimise this pattern, without taking span from context and then putting it back in startScope. But as @marcingrzejszczak  really wants it now, let's do it in follow up
timeline.author: iNikem
